titles.title: To prohibit exports of unprocessed timber and wood chips to any country that does not provide reciprocal access to its markets for finished wood products and paper produced in the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic Policy, Trade and Environment.

bill.summary: 1/5/1993--Introduced. Prohibits exports of unprocessed timber or wood chips to any country that does not provide reciprocal access to its markets for finished U.S. wood products and paper.
